description:
Orifushi Akina is the second eldest of the Orifushi sisters, and the same age as http://anidb.net/ch21010 [Haruomi]. She is a serious and perfectionist honour student who excels at housework, studies, and sports, and, to top it off, she is also cute; as such, she is something of an idol at her school. For some reason, Akina really wants to take care of Haruomi, which brings out her jealous side.
Source: VNDB
name: Orifushi Akina
